1.) Place the larvae in a 1m^3 box.
The box will already be pre-filled with dirt.
Feed the larvae the specific food described in the protocol 3-4 times a day in an interval of 2-3 hours in between.
This will allow to most efficient amount of growth.
Continue this until the larvae become pupals.
the moment when the most amount of food should be
Change the environment from the dirt by adding water.
This is where the adults mates.
After the adults mate, retrieve the newly made larvae.
